# Load dependencies and source data

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}

library(Matrix)
library(scran)
library(BiocParallel)
library(BiocNeighbors)
ncores = 3
mcparam = MulticoreParam(workers = ncores)
register(mcparam)
library(igraph)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(scater)
library(scales)
library(biomaRt)
library(batchelor)
library(irlba)
library(batchelor)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)

root.dir = "/nfs/research1/marioni/alsu/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
source(paste0(root.dir, "amScripts_mouseEmbryoFISH/core_functions.R"))

# load atlas 
sce.atlas = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/reducedAtlas/E8_25__E8_5.rds"))
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[, sce.atlas$stage == "E8.5"]
counts.atlas = logcounts(sce.atlas)
counts.atlas = assay(sce.atlas, "logcounts")
counts.cosine.atlas = as.matrix( cosineNorm( assay(sce.atlas, "logcounts")))

# load mapping
mapping = readRDS(paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/mapping_seq2atlas_embryo2z5_libsize.rds"))

```

# Impute seq

```{r impute-seq, message=FALSE}

getLogcounts = function(cells, weights){ 
  current.counts = counts.atlas[,match(cells, colnames(counts.atlas))] 
  current.counts = ( current.counts %*% weights )/sum(weights)
  return(current.counts) 
} 
getCosine = function(cells, weights){ 
  current.counts = counts.cosine.atlas[,match(cells, colnames(counts.cosine.atlas))] 
  current.counts = ( current.counts %*% weights )/sum(weights)
  return(current.counts) 
} 

logcounts.imputation.seq = bplapply(1:ncol(mapping), function(x){
  current.cell = mapping[,x]
  current.cell.stat = table(current.cell)
  current.counts = getLogcounts(names(current.cell.stat), as.numeric( current.cell.stat )) 
  return(current.counts)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
logcounts.imputation.seq = do.call(cbind, logcounts.imputation.seq)
colnames(logcounts.imputation.seq) = colnames(mapping)
saveRDS(logcounts.imputation.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/imputation/imputation_seq2atlas_logcounts_embryo2z5.rds"))


cosine.imputation.seq = bplapply(1:ncol(mapping), function(x){
  current.cell = mapping[,x]
  current.cell.stat = table(current.cell)
  current.counts = getCosine(names(current.cell.stat), as.numeric( current.cell.stat )) 
  return(current.counts)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
cosine.imputation.seq = do.call(cbind, cosine.imputation.seq)
colnames(cosine.imputation.seq) = colnames(mapping)
saveRDS(cosine.imputation.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/imputation/imputation_seq2atlas_cosine_embryo2z5.rds"))


```
